Sami Hlioui](https://cv.hal.science/sami-hlioui) (CY Cergy Paris University), we are looking for master students to study a new flux-switching machine found by topology optimization, potentially with a reduced quantity of rare earth permanent magnets. [here](/posts/2024/2024-11-07_internship_SATIE_FluxSwitching/sujet4Stage_MCF.pdf) (in French).
